definition: given or giving freely, disposing of property by voluntary transfer without receiving value in return
details:
adjective
- given or giving freely
= synonyms: big
noun
- disposing of property by voluntary transfer without receiving value in return
= example: disposing of property by voluntary transfer without receiving value in return
- the act of giving
= synonyms: gift
- the imparting of news or promises etc
= example: the imparting of news or promises etc
